list_variables.description: A list of event categories that you want to subscribe to for a given source                   type. If you don't specify this property, you are notified about all event                   categories.
list_variables.name: EventCategories

list_variables.description: A list of identifiers for which Amazon RDS provides notification events.
list_variables.name: SourceIds

variables.description: Indicates whether to activate the subscription. If you don't specify this                   property, AWS CloudFormation activates the subscription.
variables.name: Enabled

variables.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon SNS topic that you want to send event                   notifications to.
variables.name: SnsTopicArn

variables.description: The type of source for which Amazon RDS provides notification events. For example,                   if you want to be notified of events generated by a database instance, set this                   parameter to db-instance. If you don't specify a value, notifications                   are provided for all source types.
variables.name: SourceType
variables.required: Conditional. If you specify the SourceIds or                      EventCategories property, you must specify this property.
